body_html: Also, nothing to do with this PR, but I really really really want there to be single, canonical definitions of TypeMeta, so we can just store the char* pointer in it directly and be done with it...
body_text: Also, nothing to do with this PR, but I really really really want there to be single, canonical definitions of TypeMeta, so we can just store the char* pointer in it directly and be done with it...
body: Also, nothing to do with this PR, but I *really really really* want there to be single, canonical definitions of TypeMeta, so we can just store the `char*` pointer in it directly and be done with it...
